remarks: Condition for a subset of a metric space to be totally bounded. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
sstotbnd.2 $e |- N = ( M |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
sstotbnd $p |- ( ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ Y C_ X ) -> ( N e. ( TotBnd ` Y ) <-> A. d e. RR+ E. v e. Fin ( Y C_ U. v /\ A. b e. v E. x e. X b = ( x ( ball ` M ) d ) ) ) ) $.
$d M b d v x $.
$d N d v x $.
$d X b d v x $.
$d Y b d v x $.
